subject: AI & Agents
title: Medical Imaging: AI Assisting Doctors
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Medical Imaging: AI Assisting Doctors.

hook.text: An AI spots a tumor a radiologist missed. Another AI flags a healthy scan as cancer. Stakes are high.

buildup.text: Medical imaging AI detects anomalies in X-rays, CT scans, MRIs, and pathology slides.

discovery.text: Models are trained on labeled scans from expert radiologistsâ€”expensive, scarce, and sometimes disagreeing.

twist.text: FDA approval, liability, and patient trust add layers far beyond model accuracy.

climax.text: The best approach: AI as assistant, not replacement. Flag findings for human review.

punchline.text: AI sees patterns. Doctors decide treatment.

quiz.question: How should AI be used in medical imaging?
options: As an assistant that flags findings for human review
